      • withResetBackoffAfter

        public BackoffSupervisorStrategy withResetBackoffAfter(scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration timeout)
        Description copied from class: BackoffSupervisorStrategy
        The back-off algorithm is reset if the actor does not crash within the specified resetBackoffAfter. By default, the resetBackoffAfter has the same value as minBackoff.
        Specified by:
        withResetBackoffAfter in class BackoffSupervisorStrategy

        timeout - (undocumented)

        (undocumented)
